flawed_nl_solution:
Last week, Arman earned 35 hours x $10/hour = $<<35*10=350>>350.
This week, Arman could earn 40 hours x $10.5/hour = $<<40*10.5=420>>420.
So, he will receive $350 + $420 = $<<350+420=707>>707 for working two weeks.
#### 707

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 770, not 707. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
